title: Drawing, 1725–40
medium: Charcoal, brush and wash, white heightening on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and ink, lower left: Del cavre Filippo Marchionni
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: At left are three cherubim; at right the bust of a young woman, possibly representing the Virgin, in the lower right corner is the head of another seen in profile. Below at left is a lying boy, seen from the back.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, 1725–40. Charcoal, brush and wash, white heightening on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3007.
